author: Special Correspondent
text:
A businessman was robbed of Rs. 23 lakh soon after he withdrew the sum in Padiyanallur near Red Hills on Monday.

Police said Mahendran had withdrawn the money from a bank on Grand Northern Trunk Road. He had kept the cash in a bag and placed it inside his car. He was about to start the car when a stranger informed him that one of his car tyres was flat. “It was a case of attention diversion. He got out of the car and started looking around for a mechanic. When he returned to the car, he realised the bag was missing,” a policeman said.
title: Businessman robbed of Rs. 23 lakh
